RestConnector.Title: Organic Domain Keyword Count
RestConnector.HelpText: Number of organic keywords for a given domain.

Text.Title: Domain
Text.HelpText: Either a domain or a subdomain.

RestConnector.Title: Organic Competitors
RestConnector.HelpText: Competitor domains in the organic search.

Text.Title: Domain
Text.HelpText: Either a domain or a subdomain.

JsonPath.Title: Avg Position 1
JsonPath.HelpText: The average position of the given domain with the shared keywords with the respective competitor domain.

JsonPath.Title: Avg Position 2
JsonPath.HelpText: The average position of the respective competitor domain with the shared keywords with the given domain.

JsonPath.Title: Common Keywords
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of shared keywords of the competitor with the given domain.

JsonPath.Title: Traffic 1
JsonPath.HelpText: Organic traffic index of the given domain via the shared keywords with the respective competitor domain.

JsonPath.Title: Traffic 2
JsonPath.HelpText: Organic traffic index of the competitor domain via the shared keywords with the given domain.

JsonPath.Title: Costs
JsonPath.HelpText: Value of the Competitor Traffic Index if it was bought via AdWords in EUR.

JsonPath.Title: Total Keyword Count
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of keyword rankings of the competitor domain in the organic search.

JsonPath.Title: Diff Keywords
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of keyword rankings of the competitor domain in the organic search that are not shared with the given domain.

RestConnector.Title: Organic Subdomains
RestConnector.HelpText: The Subdomains in the organic search

Text.Title: Domain
Text.HelpText: Either a domain or a subdomain.

JsonPath.Title: SPI Percentage
JsonPath.HelpText: Subdomain visibility in percent

RestConnector.Title: Organic Domain Rankings
RestConnector.HelpText: Keyword rankings for a given domain in organic search results.

Text.Title: Domain
Text.HelpText: Either a domain or a subdomain

JsonPath.Title: Position
JsonPath.HelpText: Ranking position in Google's organic search.

JsonPath.Title: Page
JsonPath.HelpText: Ranking Page in Google's organic search.

JsonPath.Title: Last Months Count
JsonPath.HelpText: Local Google search volume in Google (exact match).

JsonPath.Title: Competition
JsonPath.HelpText: Google Advertising competition on the keyword.

JsonPath.Title: Avg Popularity
JsonPath.HelpText: Global Google search volume in Google (exact match).

JsonPath.Title: Cpc
JsonPath.HelpText: Estimated CPC for the keyword in EUR.

JsonPath.Title: Title
JsonPath.HelpText: Title of the entry in Google's organic ranking.

JsonPath.Title: URL
JsonPath.HelpText: URL of the entry Google's organic ranking.

JsonPath.Title: Description
JsonPath.HelpText: Description of the entry in the organic Google ranking.

JsonPath.Title: Traffic
JsonPath.HelpText: Estimation of traffic based on search volume and position.

JsonPath.Title: Ad Budget
JsonPath.HelpText: AdWords budget spent on the keyword in the last month in our database.

JsonPath.Title: Potential
JsonPath.HelpText: Traffic potential in absolute clicks in relation with top ranking position 1.

RestConnector.Title: Organic Keyword Rankings
RestConnector.HelpText: Rankings for a given keyword in organic search results.

JsonPath.Title: URL
JsonPath.HelpText: URL of the search engine entry.

JsonPath.Title: Title
JsonPath.HelpText: Title of the search engine entry.

JsonPath.Title: Position
JsonPath.HelpText: SERP = search engine ranking position.

JsonPath.Title: Page
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of Google result page.

JsonPath.Title: Trend Absolute Change
JsonPath.HelpText: The absolute change in the visibility in comparison to the previous week.

JsonPath.Title: Trend Relative Change
JsonPath.HelpText: The relative/percentual change in the visibility in comparison to the previous week.

RestConnector.Title: Organic Visibility
RestConnector.HelpText: The SEO Visibility is composed of search volume and the position of ranking keywords. Each position is individually measured by a calculated factor by Searchmetrics. Also, the SEO Visibility factors in whether the ranking keywords are navigational or informational.

Text.Title: URL
Text.HelpText: Either a domain or a subdomain.

JsonPath.Title: Trend Absolute Change
JsonPath.HelpText: The absolute change in the visibility in comparison to the previous week.

JsonPath.Title: Trend Relative Change
JsonPath.HelpText: The relative/percentual change in the visibility in comparison to the previous week.

JsonPath.Title: Backlink Page
JsonPath.HelpText: URL on which the backlink was found.

JsonPath.Title: Title
JsonPath.HelpText: Page title of the page on which the backlink was found.

JsonPath.Title: Link Text
JsonPath.HelpText: Anchor text.

JsonPath.Title: External Links
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of links on the backlink page that go to external pages.

JsonPath.Title: Internal Links
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of links on the backlink page that go to internal pages.

JsonPath.Title: Total Links
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of links on the backlink page.

JsonPath.Title: SearchMetrics Page Strength
JsonPath.HelpText: Searchmetrics calculates for each page the page strength from the weighted backlinks that point to this page. A page with many links is given a high Searchmetrics Page Strength (SPS); a page with no or only a few links a low SPS.

JsonPath.Title: Link Position
JsonPath.HelpText: All links on the backlink page are numbered in order of appearance. This number therefore reflects the position of the link on the backlink page. "1" is the first position. The higher the number is the lower is the position of the link.

JsonPath.Title: Link Target
JsonPath.HelpText: Target URL of the link.

JsonPath.Title: Tag
JsonPath.HelpText: Link type (text/image/javascript/iframe etc.)

JsonPath.Title: Country Code
JsonPath.HelpText: Country code of the server location of the backlink page.

JsonPath.Title: Country
JsonPath.HelpText: Country name of the server location of the backlink page.

JsonPath.Title: City
JsonPath.HelpText: City of the server location of the backlink page.

RestConnector.Title: Organic Rank
RestConnector.HelpText: SEO visibility rank of the domain (SEORank).

Text.Title: Domain
Text.HelpText: Either a domain or a subdomain.

RestConnector.Title: Keywords
RestConnector.HelpText: This call returns search-related information for a given keyword for a given country for the current month.

JsonPath.Title: Cpc
JsonPath.HelpText: Estimated CPC in AdWords for the specific keyword.

JsonPath.Title: Competition
JsonPath.HelpText: This is an indicator for the competion for the given keyword in the Paid Index. The higher it is the more domains that have placed AdWords ads for the keyword.

JsonPath.Title: Search Volume
JsonPath.HelpText: Current monthly search volume in Google.

JsonPath.Title: Trend
JsonPath.HelpText: The relative distribution of the search volume per month over the year for the respective keyword.

JsonPath.Title: Ad Budget
JsonPath.HelpText: Monthly Google AdWords ad budget that is spent on the keyword.

JsonPath.Title: Integration
JsonPath.HelpText: The types of universal search integrations that can be found for this keyword.

JsonPath.Title: Advertiser Count
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of advertisers bidding on the keyword.

JsonPath.Title: Keyword
JsonPath.HelpText: Keyword for which the data is returned.

JsonPath.Title: Year Month
JsonPath.HelpText: Year and month for which the data is returned.

RestConnector.Title: Keywords Similar
RestConnector.HelpText: List of keywords that contain a selected keyword.

JsonPath.Title: Search Volume
JsonPath.HelpText: Current monthly search volume in Google.

JsonPath.Title: Trend
JsonPath.HelpText: Trend for the search volume of the keyword in the previous year.

JsonPath.Title: Cpc
JsonPath.HelpText: Estimated CPC in AdWords for the specific keyword.

JsonPath.Title: Advertiser Count
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of advertisers bidding on the keyword.

JsonPath.Title: Integration
JsonPath.HelpText: Universal search items that can be found in the search results for this keyword (e.g. news,video,images etc.).

JsonPath.Title: Ad Budget
JsonPath.HelpText: Monthly Google AdWords ad budget that is spent on the keyword.

RestConnector.Title: Paid Domain Keyword Count
RestConnector.HelpText: Number of paid keywords for a domain in a given country.

Text.Title: Domain
Text.HelpText: Either a domain or a subdomain.

RestConnector.Title: Paid Keywords
RestConnector.HelpText: Paid keywords with advertisements for a given domain.

Text.Title: Domain
Text.HelpText: Either a domain or a subdomain.

JsonPath.Title: Keyword
JsonPath.HelpText: Keyword for which the data is returned.

JsonPath.Title: Position
JsonPath.HelpText: Keyword position in Google's paid search.

JsonPath.Title: Page
JsonPath.HelpText: Result page in Google's paid search.

JsonPath.Title: Traffic Monthly
JsonPath.HelpText: Estimation of monthly traffic based on search volume and position.

JsonPath.Title: Cpc
JsonPath.HelpText: Estimated CPC in AdWords for the specific keyword.

JsonPath.Title: Competition
JsonPath.HelpText: An indicator for the advertising competition on the keyword. The higher it is the stronger is the competition. Minimum is 0, maximum is 100.

JsonPath.Title: Search Volume Monthly
JsonPath.HelpText: Current monthly search volume in Google.

JsonPath.Title: Adbudget Monthly
JsonPath.HelpText: Monthly Google AdWords ad budget that is spent on the keyword.

RestConnector.Title: Paid Competitors
RestConnector.HelpText: Competitor domains in the paid search.

Text.Title: Domain
Text.HelpText: Either a domain or a subdomain.

JsonPath.Title: Domain
JsonPath.HelpText: Competitor domain

JsonPath.Title: Avg Position 1
JsonPath.HelpText: The average position of the given domain with the shared keywords with the respective competitor domain.

JsonPath.Title: Avg Position 2
JsonPath.HelpText: The average position of the respective competitor domain with the shared keywords with the given domain.

JsonPath.Title: Common Keywords
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of shared keywords of the competitor with the given domain.

JsonPath.Title: Traffic 1
JsonPath.HelpText: Organic traffic index of the given domain via the shared keywords with the respective competitor domain.

JsonPath.Title: Traffic 2
JsonPath.HelpText: Organic traffic index of the competitor domain via the shared keywords with the given domain.

JsonPath.Title: Costs
JsonPath.HelpText: Value of the Competitor Traffic Index if it was bought via AdWords.

JsonPath.Title: Total Keyword Count
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of keyword rankings of the competitor domain in the organic search.

JsonPath.Title: Diff Keywords
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of keyword rankings of the competitor domain in the organic search that are not shared with the given domain.

RestConnector.Title: Paid KPIs
RestConnector.HelpText: Collection of paid search KPIs: paid traffic, ad budget, clicks per day, average CPC, Paid Rank.

Text.Title: Domain
Text.HelpText: Either a domain or a subdomain.

JsonPath.Title: Traffic
JsonPath.HelpText: Estimated number of visitors per month that visit the page through paid advertisements. Paid search traffic index is calculated from a domain’s advertisement keywords and their positions.

JsonPath.Title: Ad Budget
JsonPath.HelpText: Estimated monthly Google AdWords advertising budget.

JsonPath.Title: Clicks per Pay
JsonPath.HelpText: Estimated clicks per day through paid advertisements.

JsonPath.Title: Cpc
JsonPath.HelpText: Estimated average CPC.

JsonPath.Title: Rank
JsonPath.HelpText: Average rank of the paid advertisements.

Text.Title: Domain
Text.HelpText: Either a domain or a subdomain.

JsonPath.Title: Domain
JsonPath.HelpText: Domain for which the PaidRank is queried.

JsonPath.Title: Visibility
JsonPath.HelpText: Searchmetrics Paid Visibility.

RestConnector.Title: Paid Visibility
RestConnector.HelpText: Searchmetrics Paid Visibility for a given URL and a given country.

Text.Title: URL
Text.HelpText: Either a domain or a subdomain.

JsonPath.Title: Trend Absolute Change
JsonPath.HelpText: The absolute change in the visibility in comparison to the previous week.

JsonPath.Title: Trend Relative Change
JsonPath.HelpText: The relative/percentual change in the visibility in comparison to the previous week.

RestConnector.Title: Backlinks Count
RestConnector.HelpText: Number of backlinks for a given domain, subdomain or URL.

Text.Title: URL
Text.HelpText: Can be either a domain, a subdomain or a page.

RestConnector.Title: Referring Domains Count
RestConnector.HelpText: Number of referring domains for a given URL. Number of referring domains for a given URL (Domain popularity).

Text.Title: URL
Text.HelpText: Can be either a domain, a subdomain or a page.

RestConnector.Title: Referring IPs Count
RestConnector.HelpText: Number of referring IPs for a given URL (IP popularity).

Text.Title: URL
Text.HelpText: Can be either a domain, a subdomain or a page.

JsonPath.Title: IPs
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of referring IPs.

JsonPath.Title: Class B
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of referring IPs with a different B-class.

JsonPath.Title: Class C
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of referring IPs with a different C-class.

RestConnector.Title: Pages
RestConnector.HelpText: List of pages of a given URL with links from external pages.

JsonPath.Title: Linked page
JsonPath.HelpText: URL of the target page.

JsonPath.Title: External links
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of external links pointing to the respective target page.

JsonPath.Title: Percentage
JsonPath.HelpText: Percentage of links pointing to the target page in relation to all links pointing to the belonging domain.

JsonPath.Title: Referring domains
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of referring domains pointing to the respective target page.

RestConnector.Title: Anchor texts
RestConnector.HelpText: Most frequently used link anchor texts for a given URL.

JsonPath.Title: Frequency
JsonPath.HelpText: Absolute total frequency of the anchor text.

JsonPath.Title: Percentage
JsonPath.HelpText: Percentual frequency of the anchor text in relation to all anchor texts.

JsonPath.Title: Referring Domains
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of referring domains with the respective anchor text.

RestConnector.Title: Organic Visibility Historic
RestConnector.HelpText: Searchmetrics SEO Visibility for a given URL in a given country in a given timeframe.

Text.Title: Domain
Text.HelpText: Either a domain or a subdomain.

RestConnector.Title: Admin Available Credits
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns the amount of available credits for the current period.

JsonPath.Title: Credits
JsonPath.HelpText: Available credits.
